features: Create a trip using the Travel Template.; Enter your dates, location, country, who you're travelling with; An automatic formula will tell you how many days you'll be travelling; Step 1 - IDEATION - Don't know where you want to go or what you want to experience, this will inspire and guide you; Step 2 - PLANNING - Here's the fun research of all the possibilities of activities, experiences, food, flights, accommodation; Step 3 - PRE-DEPARTURE - Get excited, time to check the weather and start making a bespoke packing list for your trip!; Enter details of your Itinerary database from your plan to have a day by day breakdown of what you'll be doing, as well as the cost.; The Calendar and Timelineline gives you a beautiful visual of your daily activities that you can refer to on the go.
